title: Life is Strange: Before the Storm – The Limited Edition
body:
Life is Strange: Before the Storm – The Limited Edition


Genres/Tags: Adventure, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Deck Nine Games / Square Enix
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 19.8 GB
Repack Size: 8.88 GB No Chinese was requesting the size!

 


For all “Chloes” and “Rachels” around the world, happy March 8, girls! Here is my girly repack with a special fitty size 😉

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Good Old Downloads (NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: 2 hosters (Uploaded by Susch, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Life.is.Strange.Before.the.Storm.Farewell-CODEX ISO release: codex-life.is.strange.before.the.storm.farewell.iso (21,230,288,896 bytes)
  • Four episodes included
  • Optional Russian localization by Tolma4 included (Farewell bonus episode not yet translated); If installed, replaced English translation – can be reverted back by copying files from “Life is Strange – Before the Storm_Data\StreamingAssets\Localization\EN_BACKUP” to “Life is Strange – Before the Storm_Data\StreamingAssets\Localization\EN”
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 19.8 to 8.9 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~25 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~50 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 22 GB (up to 40 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses pUnity library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Life is Strange: Before the Storm is a new three part (+ bonus episode) standalone adventure set three years before the first game in the BAFTA award-winning franchise.

You play as sixteen-year old Chloe Price who forms an unlikely friendship with Rachel Amber, a beautiful and popular girl destined for success.

When Rachel learns a secret about her family that threatens to destroy her world, it is her newfound friendship with Chloe that gives her the strength to carry on.

No longer alone the girls must confront each other’s demons and together, find a way to overcome them.

Game Features

  • Choice and consequence driven narrative adventure
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices you make
  • ‘Backtalk’ – A risk/reward conversation mode that allows Chloe to use her barbed tongue to provoke or get her way
  • Make your mark on the world with witty tags and drawings
  • Choose Chloe’s outfit and see how people react to your look
  • Distinct Licensed indie soundtrack & original score by Daughter
